summary: No new characters or connections in this chapter.
summary_short: Alyosha Karamazov is the most connected figure (25 ties).
highlights: Most central: Alyosha Karamazov (25), Dmitri Karamazov (25), Fyodor Karamazov (24), Ivan Karamazov (20)
story_summary: Dmitri violently confronts Grigory and Fyodor Pavlovitch, believing Grushenka is hidden in the house, but discovers all entrances are locked and she is not there. After attacking Fyodor Pavlovitch, Dmitri leaves in anger, while Ivan and Alyosha tend to the injured old man and discuss the tense family situation. Alyosha agrees to visit Grushenka and plans to meet their father the next morning, while he and Ivan share a rare moment of understanding.
evidence_quotes: Dmitri struck out, and hit Grigory with all his might.
